name: supermemory
title: Supermemory
description: Add items to your Supermemory directly from Raycast!
author: Lermatroid

commands.name: add-site-to-supermemory
commands.title: Quick Create Memory
commands.description: Quickly create a memory in Supermemory from the current tab.

preferences.name: apikey
preferences.title: Supermemory API Key
preferences.description: Your API key from Supermemory. Can be obtained on supermemory.ai from Add Memory > Integrations > Your API Key.

preferences.name: autospace
preferences.label: Auto Select A Space For Your Memory
preferences.description: If enabled, the extension will automatically pick a space (if applicable) in Supermemory using GPT-4o mini when using Quick Add.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
